name: Samurai Revenge
description: Samurai Revenge is an action clear version to clear the level. The game has 7 levels. There are several different styles of enemies such as swordsmen and archers, as well as various traps that require quick response. The game also includes Combo upgrade system. With the upgrade of skills, you can make powerful combos to quickly kill enemies. There are also tense survival mode and one-shot mode for players to explore.
